metadata.title: CVE-2020-26797 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Mediainfo before version 20.08 has a heap buffer overflow vulnerability viaMediaInfoLib::File_Gxf::ChooseParser_ChannelGrouping.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 0.7.82-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
python-mediainfodll - 0.7.82-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
python3-mediainfodll - 0.7.82-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.82-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
